trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNZ010_01735_SEQ_00<tab>Ysaudore peers over the cliff with concern.

TEXT_HEAVNZ010_01735_SEQ_01<tab>The area around Camp Riversmeet was once a field of rich, rolling meadows. Now it is a frozen wasteland, home to fierce, hungry wolves. Ysaudore seems intent on driving these beasts away and has entrusted you with a mission: slay three silver wolves.
TEXT_HEAVNZ010_01735_SEQ_02<tab>You have slain the wolves as requested. Return to Ysaudore, and let her hear of your success.

TEXT_HEAVNZ010_01735_SEQ_03<tab>Ysaudore thanks you for your hard work. Camp Riversmeet once served as a military outpost, quartering Ishgardian troops and facilitating patrols of the surrounding area. Ysaudore hopes to see the camp reclaimed and the area made safe once more.

TEXT_HEAVNZ010_01735_YSAUDORE_000_000<tab>Some ways beyond here lies Camp Riversmeet. The camp was once the center of luscious pastures─a prime grazing field for cattle and other livestock... Now it's home to naught more than wolves.
TEXT_HEAVNZ010_01735_YSAUDORE_000_001<tab>Pray help drive the beasts away with sword and spell. Slay three silver wolves─let them learn to fear us.
TEXT_HEAVNZ010_01735_YSAUDORE_000_010<tab>Pray drive away the creatures at Camp Riversmeet. Slay three of the silver wolves found skulking there.
TEXT_HEAVNZ010_01735_YSAUDORE_000_040<tab>You've already slain those horrid wolves? You have my deepest thanks.

TEXT_HEAVNZ010_01735_YSAUDORE_000_041<tab>There was a time when there were Ishgardian troops stationed at Camp Riversmeet. Should we recover the camp─were we able to station soldiers there again─it would make our patrols safer, let them cover more area...
TEXT_HEAVNZ010_01735_YSAUDORE_000_042<tab>Before long, we shall move to reclaim the camp. When that time comes, I may call upon your services again.
